BASE.TITLE: Leave the tutorial
BASE.SUBTITLE: Do you really want to leave the tutorial ?

1.TITLE: Hello new poper!
1.TEXT1: I'll introduce the application from this tutorial and show you the way to become the most popular.
1.TEXT2: You can ignore this tutorial at any time by clicking on the 'Skip' button.

2.TITLE: Welcome to your profile page
2.TEXT4: The time you have to wait before putting a new picture

3.TITLE: That's the game page !
3.TEXT1: You may like or dislike the popies of other players by swiping the pictures to the right or left or from the buttons at the bottom of the page
3.TEXT2: So what do you think of this picture ?

4.TITLE: Great
4.TEXT2: Ah, I think someone popped your picture :)

5.TITLE: Someone liked your picture
5.TEXT1: You can click on the photo of the poper to open his profile.
5.TEXT2: Go back to your profile and reload your page !

6.TITLE: Here is his profile
6.TEXT1: You can see these popies and write them right away

7.TITLE: Very good !
7.TEXT1: Now, let's go back to your profile, your score has evolved !

8.TITLE: Back to your profile
8.TEXT1: Refresh your screen with a swipe towards the bottom of the page, and you will see your score evolved ...
8.TEXT2: You can now become the most lame !

9.TITLE: It's finish
9.TEXT1: You can now become the most flexible !
